description: Garmin’s flagship Forerunner for serious athletes, featuring advanced training metrics, long battery life, and full smartwatch capabilities.
A mid-range GPS running watch offering great value with accurate tracking, music storage, and daily workout suggestions.
An entry-level GPS running watch with an AMOLED display, heart rate tracking, and smartwatch features like music and notifications.
Apple’s rugged, adventure-ready smartwatch with dual-frequency GPS, dive features, and up to 36 hours of battery life.
A sleek, versatile smartwatch that’s perfect for everyday fitness tracking and smartwatch features like music, calls, and apps.
A powerful multisport watch with Suunto’s best-in-class battery life and a vibrant AMOLED display, made for endurance athletes.
An ultra-light and stylish GPS watch with excellent durability, long battery life, and precise performance tracking.
Coros’s most rugged GPS watch built for ultra runners and adventurers, with dual-frequency GPS and up to 60 days of battery in standard mode.
A balanced choice for runners wanting premium performance, offline maps, accurate GPS, and exceptional battery life.
Ultra-light and affordable GPS watch designed for serious runners, offering long battery life, accurate tracking, and powerful training tools.
A top-tier outdoor GPS watch with military-grade durability, dual-frequency GPS, and AMOLED display for serious explorers.
Reliable and rugged multisport GPS watch with strong battery life and detailed training tools for runners and outdoor athletes.
